body_html:
@peterjc123
I resolved almost all linkage errors by including all the headers and libs (plus cudart) that you provided, but I still get the following error:
error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol state
caused by
extern THCState *state;
in my c-code (inspired by https://github.com/pytorch/extension-ffi/blob/master/script/src/my_lib_cuda.c) .
I don't really have a clue on how to solve that.

body:
@peterjc123 
I resolved almost all linkage errors by including all the headers and libs (plus cudart) that you provided, but I still get the following error:
`error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol state`
caused by 
`extern THCState *state;` 
in my c-code (inspired by [https://github.com/pytorch/extension-ffi/blob/master/script/src/my_lib_cuda.c](https://github.com/pytorch/extension-ffi/blob/master/script/src/my_lib_cuda.c)) .
I don't really have a clue on how to solve that.
